item.title: rdf4j 3.0.0 Milestone 2 available
item.author: webdev@eclipse-foundation.org (Christopher Guindon)
item.description:
We’re pleased to announce the second milestone build for rdf4j 3.0.0.

Rdf4j 3.0 is a major new release of the rdf4j framework. It contains several backward incompatible changes.

Some highlights:

item.title: rdf4j 3.0.0 Milestone 1 available
item.author: webdev@eclipse-foundation.org (Christopher Guindon)
item.description:
We’re pleased to announce the first milestone build for rdf4j 3.0.0.

Rdf4j 3.0 is a major new release of the rdf4j framework. It contains several backward incompatible changes.

Some highlights:

item.title: new project website
item.author: webdev@eclipse-foundation.org (Christopher Guindon)
item.description: As you can see, we’ve given our website a fresh coat of paint. We’ve updated our site to use the Eclipse Solstice theme, and have unified our general website and documentation site in a single project. This makes updating, maintaining, and improving the site and the project documentation a lot easier.

item.title: rdf4j 2.5.0 released
item.author: webdev@eclipse-foundation.org (Christopher Guindon)
item.description: We are very pleased to announce the release of Eclipse rdf4j 2.5. This release addresses over 70 issues, and includes several major new features and improvements, including:
